textBeforeTable: I'm going to start working on Cashiers du Cinemart #19. Are you interested in having your work in the new issue? Send your proposals for articles/artwork/whatever to impossiblefunky@gmail.com by November 30, 2014. I'm just looking for a few sentences of description of what you have in mind. Here's the proposed timeline for CdC #19: Call for Submissions Contact About Books Issue 1 Issue 2 Issue 3 Issue 4 Issue 5 Issue 6 Issue 7 Issue 8 Issue 9 Issue 10 Issue 11 Issue 12 Issue 13 Issue 14 Issue 15 Issue 16 Issue 17 Issue 18 Issues
textAfterTable: I'd love if I could find a cover illustrator as well as an illustrator for the inner pages. I will be revising the style guide and have this available by the first of 2015 (if not sooner). Welcome Welcome to the new Cashiers du Cinemart website. I've been meaning to revamp Impossible Funky for a long time and finally found the time to do so after sitting on this URL for years. Issues 6-18 of Cashiers du Cinemart are almost entirely available for perusal. I'll be making updates over the next few weeks/months as there's a lot of data clean-up that needs to happen. I'm also hoping to add some images and maybe even put up those first five issues that are only partially digitized at the moment. The site has a long way to go but I'm hoping it will be a valuable resource once it's done. Facebook © Cashiers du Cinemart Sitemap Back to Top
